lines.text: Dog shit. Look, the thickest portion of the shit probably came from where the heel and the sole meet, forming a perfect footprint.
Do yourself a favour, Mac, lay off the booze. You're bordering on pathetic.
I don't know, Roger. I just think it's a little strange that Maria would have an affair with a suicidal killer.
The cops are after me... Soon they'll be after you too.
